skillTree.localised_description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Lustria, tempted from their tropical jungles to bear the Lizardmen to battle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: The ultimate jungle hunters, these large, apex predators have terrorised the primordial jungles since the dawn of existence.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
Those Saurus not lost to war may live to a great age - their long service esteemed and respected by younger Lizardmen hungry for experience.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Saurus mark the passage of time through the ever-increasing hoariness of their scales and the ossification of their battle-worn plates.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +20% for this Character

skillTree.localised_description: Featureless slabs of obsinite used for the Saurus’ weapons are reinforced with cruelly misshapen jade and, most importantly, gemstones symbolising the favour of Sotek.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Every skirmish thickens the corded muscle of the surviving Saurus, increasing their resilience commensurately with their instinctual understanding of battle manoeuvres.
The Great Plan seems beyond reproach when faced with eight feet of scar-ridden reptilian muscle festooned with the shrunken heads of sacrificed foes.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Saurus units
	(own army)

Missile resistance: 5% for Saurus and Temple Guard units
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Whilst one brother lives in darkness, the other, his double-twin, exists in light. Behold!"
"By your scales be you blessed by the divine protector."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Brother of Great Tlazcotl, Tepok of the Air shall always be honoured. Let it be done."
"Cousin of darkness, Huanchi's priests too shall dwell in twilight."

effects.description:
Double experience gain when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The universe resides within his reflective eyes; embrace the coldness of blessed certainty."
"Creator-meld of the beast, Itzl be praised!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Ancient Salamander, Stegadon, Bastiladon, Coatl, Dread Saurian, Feral Troglodon and Carnosaur units
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...
The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hidden skill to grant Kroq'Gar's Saurus characters extra scaling
Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can block projectiles regardless of its facing.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."
"The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for Advanced Military Recruitment buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty
